member.name: T:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment
member.summary: Represents a media attachment to the message.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.RemoteId
member.summary: Gets or sets the media bucket storage remote id of the attachment.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.RemoteUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the remote URI for the attachment, which links to the attachment content.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the MIME media type of the content.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.MediaType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the attachment.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the attachment size, in bytes.

member.name: P:Takenet.Omni.Model.Attachment.ThumbnailUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the attachment thumbnail image URI.

member.name: T:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType
member.summary: Defines the attachment media type for proper handling.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Unknown
member.summary: The type is unknown.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Image
member.summary: The type is an image from the gallery.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Photo
member.summary: The type is an photo taken from the camera.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Music
member.summary: The type is a music track.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Audio
member.summary: The type is a recorded audio.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.Video
member.summary: The type is a video.

member.name: F:Takenet.Omni.Model.AttachmentMediaType.ProfilePictures
member.summary: The type is a profile picture.
